tool_description: Tracks and validates milestone achievement status by analyzing assessment data and observations against developmental standards.

assessment_data_ids.description: Array of assessment and observation IDs to analyze

milestone_framework.description: Milestone framework to use: CDC, ASQ, Denver, Bayley

confidence_threshold.description: Minimum confidence level to mark milestone as achieved (0.5-1.0)

error_messages: Invalid profile ID: Profile not found in system
Invalid assessment ID: One or more assessment IDs not found
Invalid framework: Use CDC, ASQ, Denver, or Bayley
Invalid confidence threshold: Must be between 0.5 and 1.0
Insufficient data: Need assessment data to determine milestone status
usage: Analyze assessment and observation data to determine milestone achievement status. Set confidence threshold to adjust sensitivity of milestone detection.

achieved_milestones.description: Milestones confirmed as achieved with high confidence

emerging_milestones.description: Milestones showing progress but not yet fully achieved

confidence_scores.description: Confidence scores for each milestone assessment

next_expected.description: Upcoming milestones to watch for based on child's age

tracking_date.description: When this milestone tracking analysis was performed
